data.text: Tso Moab ŋuti:
Womagakafu Moab azɔ o,
Se ɣli si le ɖiɖim tso Horonaim ɖa,
Woamu Moab aƒu anyi
Wodze Luhit mɔ dzi le avi fam hehehe.
Misi! Miɖe miaƒe agbe eye mianɔ abe gbe le gbegbe ene.
Esi nèɖo dzi ɖe wò dɔwɔwɔwo
Nugblẽla ava du sia du me eye du aɖeke masi o.
Mide dze Moab elabena aƒaƒã eye eƒe duwo azu aƒedo,
“Aɖi ame si le asi blem le Yehowa ƒe dɔ ŋu!
“Moab li bɔkɔɔ tso eƒe ɖevime ke
Yehowa be, ‘Gake ŋkekewo li gbɔna esi maɖo ŋutsu
Ekema Kemos akpe ŋu na Moab,
“Aleke miate ŋu agblɔ be, ‘Míenye kalẽtɔwo,
Woagbã Moab kple eƒe duwo
“Moab ƒe anyidzedze tu aƒe,
Mi ame siwo katã ƒo xlãe,
“Ɖi le wò ŋutikɔkɔe me eye nànɔ anyi ɖe anyigba
Mi ame siwo le Aroer,
Wodo ŋukpe Moab elabena wogbãe gudugudu.
Ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ va du siwo le to tame la dzi.
Eva Dibon, Nebo kple Bet Diblataim dzi.
Eva Kiriataim, Bet Gamul kple Bet Meon dzi,
Eva Keriyɔt, Bozra kple Moab duwo katã dzi,
Wolã Moab ƒe dzo ɖa, woŋe eƒe abɔ.”
“Mina aha Moab wòano amu,
Ɖe menye Israel ye nye wò alɔmeɖenu oa?
Mi Moabtɔwo, misi le miaƒe duwo me,
Yehowa be, “Míese Moab ƒe dada, ɖokuiŋudzedze, adegbeƒoƒo,
Menya eƒe tonumasemase gake toflokoe,
Eya ta mado ɣli ɖe Moab ŋu
O, mi Sibma wainkawo,
Dzidzɔ kple aseyetsotso nu
“Woƒe aviɣli ɖi tso Hesbon,
Maɖo asi ame siwo sa vɔ le nuxeƒewo
Yehowa be, “Eya ta nye dzi le nu xam le Moab ŋu abe dzekuku ene,
Wolũ ta ɖe sia ɖe eye woƒlɔ ge ɖe sia ɖe,
Le Moab ƒe xɔwo katã tame
“Wogbãe gudugudu loo!
Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Woaxɔ Keriyɔt kple eƒe mɔ sesẽwo.
Woatsrɔ̃ Moab, be maganye dukɔ azɔ o,
O, Moabtɔwo, ŋɔdzi,
“Ame si si le ŋɔdzi nu la age adze ʋe globo la me,
“Sitsoƒedilawo tɔ ɖe Hesbon ƒe vɔvɔli te xɔnamemanɔsitɔe,
Baba na wò, O Moab!
“Ke hã la, magaɖo Moab ƒe nunyonamewo te
